title: Run a Workspace in FME Server

questions.question: Which FME Server menu selection lets you browse your repositories and workspaces like a file browser?
Which of the following details is not contained in the Jobs completed page?
options: How many times the job has been previously submitted

questions.question: I have a Server with two engines. Four users submit jobs at the same time. What happens?
options: The four jobs will be processed simultaneously, sharing the two engines.
Two jobs are processed. The other two sit in a queue until an engine becomes free.
Two extra engines will fire up automatically to process all four jobs.
Two jobs are processed. Two jobs are returned to their authors.

questions.question: Which of the following is not one of the tabs available to view Jobs?
Job logs on FME Server contain the same level of detail as logs run on FME Desktop.
